name: SecureMe (Windows)
tagline: A User-friendly approach to PC Security & Management.
body:
### Welcome to SecureMe!
I started this project with a friend as a part of the CyberPatriot (Cyber Defense) Competition of which I was a part of, and It evolved into an idea: In a world where so many people have computer problems, The reason behind it is the idea is that most people don't know how to properly manage their computers. That is why I developed this piece of software. I want to give everyone an easy way to manage and secure their desktop or laptop PCs.

### It's Geared towards Grandpa.
You know that one person, who can't use a computer to save their life? The clean, easy-to-navigate UI of SecureMe should even allow and empower them to keep their computer in check.

### Full PC Management and Security:
SecureMe allows anyone to manage all the important aspects of their computer. Management options include: Processes, Services, Software Packages, Ports, and more.

### Looking for the latest release?
For now, releases are being hosted by GitHub, so click here to download the latest & greatest: https://github.com/lukedinkler/SecureMe-Windows/releases

### Support or Contact:
Any problems with the software or simply suggestions for new updates? Simply contact me at ljdinkler@gmail.com, and I'd be happy to help in any way I can!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
